mapper.select: select a.id,a.orderno,a.orderprice as sprice,a.province,a.city,a.county,a.address,a.acceptname as acceptuser,a.accepttel,a.storeid as sid,d.storename as sname,a.createtime as time,a.status,a.goodscode as picknum,a.sendtime,a.paytype,a.remark from order_info a,app_useraddr c,store_info d where a.isdel=0 and a.storeid=d.id and a.storeid=#{sid} and a.addrid=c.id and (a.status=3 or a.status=5) order by a.id desc limit #{pageStart} , #{pageSize}
select count(*) from order_info a,app_user b,app_useraddr c where a.isdel=0 and a.userid=b.id and a.storeid=#{sid} and a.addrid=c.id and (a.status=3 or a.status=5)

select a.id,a.orderno,a.orderprice as sprice,a.province,a.city,a.county,a.address,a.acceptname as acceptuser,a.accepttel,a.storeid as sid,d.storename as sname,a.createtime as time,a.status,a.goodscode as picknum,a.sendtime,a.paytype,a.remark from order_info a,app_shopaddr c,store_info d where a.isdel=0 and a.storeid=d.id and a.storeid=#{sid} and a.addrid=c.id and (a.status=3 or a.status=5) order by a.id desc limit #{pageStart} , #{pageSize}
select count(*) from order_info a,app_user b,app_shopaddr c where a.isdel=0 and a.userid=b.id and a.storeid=#{sid} and a.addrid=c.id and (a.status=3 or a.status=5)

select a.*,b.provname as provname,c.cityname,d.countyname from store_info a left join area_province b on a.provincecode=b.provcode left join area_city c on a.citycode=c.citycode left join area_county d on a.countycode=d.countycode where a.isdel=0 and a.id=#{id}
select b.name as name,a.ordernum as count,a.productid as gid,b.imgurl,a.opprice from order_product a left join product_info b on a.productid=b.id where a.orderid=#{orderid}
